The first trailer is below. If you enjoy games where you match the same color with the same number of dots on your screen, you might enjoy Outhouse Media's 'System in Action'. Speed through your favorite games with visual cues, with stages swapped around like a game of Candy Crush. Make your mark on the stages you enjoy with visual cues. This is 'on selection', a new video game from Outhouse Media. It'll be available on PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC, and Includes all the features of the original, but not the downloadable content and competitions. The game will be available from September 25th, 2015.
